description:
We want to provide a button + a mechanism to export from the current datatable in excel in order to create a useful. For example near Import Client, a new button with Export Client. The user story:
1.the user clicks on export client
2. the ui generate an event to the system
3. the system provides a way to export the table in excel (ie. the complete list of client) and asks the user where to save.
name: Mifos/Angular. Export to XSL from main data/grid table.
